description: Free unofficial patches are now available for a new Windows Themes zero-day vulnerability that allows attackers to steal a target's NTLM credentials remotely. [...]
title: New Windows Themes zero-day gets free, unofficial patches

description: Over 22,000 CyberPanel instances exposed online to a critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability were mass-targeted in a PSAUX ransomware attack that took almost all instances offline. [...]
title: Massive PSAUX ransomware attack targets 22,000 CyberPanel instances

description: QNAP has fixed a critical zero-day vulnerability exploited by security researchers on Thursday to hack a TS-464 NAS device during the Pwn2Own Ireland 2024 competition. [...]
title: QNAP fixes NAS backup software zero-day exploited at Pwn2Own

description: The United States announced charges today against Maxim Rudometov, a Russian national, for being the suspected developer and administrator of the RedLine malware operation, one of the most prolific infostealers over the past few years. [...]
title: Russian charged by U.S. for creating RedLine infostealer malware
